response.overview: Get ready for a wildly diverse, star-studded trilogy about life in the big city. One of the most-talked about films in years, New York Stories features the creative collaboration of three of America's most popular directors, Martin Scorsese, Francis Coppola, and Woody Allen.

production_companies.name: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions

response.title: New York Stories

cast.name: Paul Herman
cast.character: Detective Flynn / Clifford, The Doorman / Cop

cast.name: Martin Scorsese
cast.character: Man Having Picture Taken with Lionel Dobie
